channel.title: CVE Feed for ManageEngine -- OpManager, Remote Monitoring and Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ManageEngine -- OpManager, Remote Monitoring and Management

item.title: CVE-2024-5466|2024-08-23T13:23:22.144Z -- manageengine -- opmanager%2C%20remote%20monitoring%20and%20management
item.description: Zohocorp ManageEngine OpManager and Remote Monitoring and Management versions 128329 and below are vulnerable to the authenticated remote code execution in the deploy agent option.
